UPDATE cms_bt_jm_promotion_product AS a JOIN (SELECT cms_bt_jm_promotion_product_id,AVG(market_price) AS market_price,AVG(deal_price) AS deal_price,AVG(`discount`) AS discount FROM `cms_bt_jm_promotion_sku` WHERE cms_bt_jm_promotion_product_id=#{cmsBtJmPromotionProductId}) AS b ON a.id=b.cms_bt_jm_promotion_product_id SET a.deal_Price=b.deal_price,a.market_price=b.market_price,a.discount=b.discount WHERE a.id =#{cmsBtJmPromotionProductId}
